room_title: Escape room "Red vs Blue" by Situation Room in Macon
review: Had such a fun time we did another room the same day.

room_title: Escape room "Red vs Blue" by Situation Room in Macon
review: Went for a group activity. This was my first escape room experience. Our helper was very nice and gave us clues but didn't give it away. We did Red vs Blue and it was hard! It wasn't so hard that it wasn't fun but we didn't finish in time. We definitely needed to work together. We were soooo close but fell short. I still had a great time and would do it again. The restroom was clean and I parked in the garage. Staff was super friendly and the rules were explained well.

room_title: Escape room "Red vs Blue" by Situation Room in Macon
review: I really had a great time playing Red vs Blue. The staff are very nice and the game was very entertaining. I will definitely come back to play the other game.

room_title: Escape room "Red vs Blue" by Situation Room in Macon
review: We really enjoyed our time at the Situation Room! Our group, which consisted of 4 adults and 6 kids (ages 8 to 17) tried Red vs Blue. We didn't end up escaping, but everyone was able to contribute in some way and we all had fun. I would definitely recommend it!

room_title: Escape room "Red vs Blue" by Situation Room in Macon
review: Played Red vs. Blue with my almost 70-year-old parents, sister and brother-in-law, and 11 year old niece. We didn't make it out in time but came very close. Everyone had a blast! It was more impressive than I thought it would be, and I would highly recommend it to anyone! Can't wait to try out Stellar.
